# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        new_current_line = isempty(current_line) ? word : "$current_line $word"
        
        if length(new_current_line) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line = new_current_line
        end
    end
    
    push!(lines, current_line)  # Don't forget the last line!
    return join(lines, '\n')
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque id turpis."
result = wrap_string(text)
println(result)
```

Output:

```
Lorem ipsum
dolor sit amet,
consectetur
adipiscing elit.
Pellentesque id
turpis.
```
